Control Name: Assesses Changes in the External Environment—The risk identification process considers changes to the regulatory, economic, and physical environment in which the entity operates.

control_attributes.Control: Assesses Changes in the External Environment—The risk identification process considers changes to the regulatory, economic, and physical environment in which the entity operates.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC3.4 COSO Principle 9: The entity identifies and assesses changes that could significantly impact the system of internal control.
